attributes.title: My SIRI turned racist??
attributes.review: When I opened up the app 📲 my phone instantly started spewing hate speech🙊 My Siri somehow turned racist 😳😫 Now every time I want to ask Siri how to peel spaghetti 🍝 or where the nearest troll bridge 👺is, she uses a variety of vile slurs. This app is a virus 🦠 but of course Donald wouldn’t do anything about a virus 🤭✨

attributes.title: Horrible Experience
attributes.review: Unfortunately, I downloaded the app. As soon as I opened it a cheeto casted an evil spell on me. I am no longer able to bathe properly due to this spell. Every time I step foot into a bath I start to sing the my little pony theme song. Please don't download this app.

attributes.title: No 😻
attributes.review: They asked for my nudes and then leaked them bruh. Then they told me that my booty stank and my face crooked when I complained. I tried to work on it but it gave me a virus and told me “that’s why yo uncle built like a tangerine.” I want a refund even know it was free! Please take this down so other people don’t fall for it!

attributes.title: AWAY FORM CHILDREN
attributes.review: Trump 2020✨and all but I came into his app to support our president but then I see my child crying remind u she is only 7 and dosent k ow much stuff, she shows me the picture of a Cheeto hanging from Donald trumps waist I see how small it is and go “ give me my phone back “ pleas delete app if u have kids

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Immediately when I entered the app I was told racial slurs and was hit with rubber bullets. After trying to stand after that attack, tear gas was thrown into my face. Donald trump then came over and slapped me in the face and called me a baby. This app is terrible. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Absolutely disturbing
attributes.review: I can’t believe the first thing I saw when I opened this app was trumps tiny penis. I was disturbing to say the least. Than when I clicked on the section that was marked “cp” and I cannot believe my eyes. There was videos of Donald trump raping a little girl. Do not download pleeeeaaassseeee.

attributes.title: My spider threw up
attributes.review: I downloaded the app after eating my oatmeal like gen-Zs do and as soon as I opened it and was about to put in my phone number the spider on my wall threw up and told me that if I didn’t give it a one star and delete it he would eat me. So I had to do it. 😌

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: immediately downloaded this app because I wanted to show my president my support!! but i was disappointed by what appeared to be a cheeto puffed colored ✨oompa loompa✨pretending to show support for BLM. I expected to see a true leader like obama. this app is a LIE and is not what i signed up for, I want my money back

attributes.title: I legit can’t do anything on this app
attributes.review: This app is INCREDIBLY annoying and has tons of bugs and kinks! It spread viruses to my phone that now track my location and anytime I open the news app my phone entirely shuts down!! Why would it attack the news app???

attributes.title: worst app ever. gave me heart palpitations 😩💔😑
attributes.review: 🚨do not give this app if you are a cop loving conservative🚨this app just gave me bad vibes and bad luck. I literally downloaded it and then it forced me to educate myself of the systemic racism and see innocent people getting hurt for simply doing their 1st amendment right😪. And then I ripped my favorite trump 2020 shirt 😪.
